TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會傳遞至事件處理常式事件的控制項。The object is passed to event handlers for the event of the control. 您使用以手動方式指定傳回的資料，以及如何排序和分頁時就會傳回資料的物件。You use the object to manually specify what data is returned, and how the data is sorted and paged when it is returned. 您可以以程式設計方式新增或移除 GroupBy、 OrderBy、 OrderGroupsBy、 Select、 參數和 Where 子句使用， ， ， ，和集合。You can programmatically add or remove parameters to the GroupBy, OrderBy, OrderGroupsBy, Select, and Where clauses by using the , , , , and collections. 屬性可讓您變更用來查詢資料物件。The property enables you to change the data object that is used for the query. 如果您將物件指派給屬性，該物件會用於查詢而不是在指定的物件屬性控制項。If you assign an object to the property, that object will be used for queries instead of the object specified in the property of the control. 屬性可讓您自訂傳回的資料已排序和分頁。The property enables you to customize how returned data is sorted and paged. 資料繫結控制項傳遞排序和分頁透過屬性屬性。The data-bound control passes sorting and paging properties through the property. 如果您必須手動處理排序或分頁，請設定屬性或屬性若要控制`false`。If you have to manually handle sorting or paging, set the property or property of the control to `false`. 您可以接著用於排序或分頁中的處理常式執行自訂的查詢事件。You can then perform the customized query for sorting or paging in a handler for the event. 如果屬性設定為`true`，您必須傳回的值屬性。If the property is set to `true`, you must return a value for the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定使用 language integrated query (LINQ) 所做的搜尋結果的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property to the result of a search made by using language-integrated query (LINQ). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/default2.aspx.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性來定義網頁中的字串值陣列。The following example shows how to set the property to an array of string values that is defined in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Arguments As DataSourceSelectArguments

summary.span: 取得決定資料之傳回方式的值。

span.span: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.

value.span: 物件，包含決定資料之傳回方式的值。

span.span: An object that contains values for determining how the data is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項傳遞至屬性透過控制屬性，就可以指定發生分頁和排序方式。A data-bound control passes properties to the control through the property in order to specify how paging and sorting should occur. 如果屬性或屬性設定為`true`，則自動控制排序或根據從資料繫結控制項屬性的頁面。If the property or the property is set to `true`, the control automatically sorts or pages based on the properties from the data-bound control. 排序及分頁查詢，藉由設定資料的方式，您可以自訂並屬性，以`false`，然後再建立的處理常式事件。You can customize how the data is sorted and paged from a query by setting the and properties to `false` and then creating a handler for the event. 在 事件處理常式中，使用来擷取的排序屬性和資料繫結控制項中的分頁屬性。In the event handler, use the property to retrieve the sorting and paging properties from the data-bound control. 然後視需要自訂查詢，根據從屬性屬性。Then customize the query as needed, based on the properties from the property. 如果的屬性物件設定為`true`，您必須傳回的值屬性。If the property of the object is set to `true`, you must return a value for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property GroupByParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ GroupByParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來建立 GroupBy 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the GroupBy clause.

value.span: 物件，包含 GroupBy 子句的參數。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the GroupBy clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來存取參數處理常式中的 GroupBy 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the GroupBy clause in a handler for the event. 您可以新增或移除此集合中的參數，以修改 GroupBy 子句。You can modify the GroupBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 根據預設，的屬性物件包含您加入的任何參數屬性控制項。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the property of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderByParameters As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得用來建立 OrderBy 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the OrderBy clause.

value.span: 物件，包含 OrderBy 子句的參數。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the OrderBy clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來存取參數處理常式中的 OrderBy 子句事件。You use the property to access parameters for the OrderBy clause in a handler for the event. 您可以新增或移除此集合中的參數，以修改 OrderBy 子句。You can modify the OrderBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 根據預設，的屬性物件包含您加入的任何參數的控制項。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. 當屬性設定為`true`中的參數集合不需要加以命名。When the property is set to `true`, parameters in the collection do not have to be named. 會根據參數的順序排序資料集合。The data will be ordered based on the sequence of the parameters in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrderGroupsByParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ OrderGroupsByParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來建立子句的參數集合，該子句指定如何排序分組的資料。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.

value.span: 物件，包含子句的參數，該子句指定如何排序分組的資料。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由設定，會在群組資料時屬性，您可以排序群組的資料，藉由設定屬性設為其中用來分組資料的屬性。When you group data by setting the property, you can sort the grouped data by setting the property to one of the properties used for grouping the data. 您使用屬性來存取 Order Groups By 子句中的處理常式的參數事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Order Groups By clause in a handler for the event. 您可以修改的 Order Groups By 子句，藉由新增或移除此集合中的參數。You can modify the Order Groups By clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 根據預設，的屬性物件包含以宣告方式加入的任何參數的控制項。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added declaratively to the of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Result { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Result : obj with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料查詢中使用的資料物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the data object that is used in the data query.
An object that represents the data for the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項適用於其查詢運算式中定義的物件屬性。By default, the control applies its query expressions to the object defined in the property. 中的處理常式事件，您可以手動變更哪個物件查詢藉由設定物件的屬性。In a handler for the event, you can manually change which object is queried by setting the property to an object. 例如，您可以使用屬性查詢的記憶體中集合，在網頁上，或從 LINQ 查詢運算式中取得的結果。For example, you can use the property to query an in-memory collection in the Web page, or to get the results from a LINQ query expression. 您可以設定任何物件的屬性。You can set the property to any object. 如果物件未實作介面，控制物件實作中包裝物件介面。If the object does not implement the interface, the control wraps the object in an object that does implement the interface. 當以外的其他屬性設定為任何值`null`，則控制項不會查詢中所定義的物件屬性。When the property is set to any value other than `null`, the control does not query the object defined in the property. 相反地，它會查詢中的物件屬性。Instead, it queries the object in the property. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定屬性的物件，請勿使用`null`來代表不包含任何資料的物件。When you set the property to an object, do not use `null` to represent an object that does not contain any data. 控制項能解譯`null`來表示未設定屬性，它會建立並查詢中的物件屬性。The control interprets `null` to mean that the property is not set, and it will create and query the object in the property. 若要表示的物件，不包含資料，請設定屬性，以或物件不包含任何項目。To represent an object that does not contain data, set the property to an or object that does not contain any elements. ， ，並當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發事件物件，和兩個額外的條件套用屬性。The , , and events are not raised when you programmatically set the property to an object, and when two additional conditions apply. 在條件為原始值，不需要儲存在檢視狀態或中的物件屬性會實作介面。The conditions are that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the property implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定的 LINQ 查詢結果的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property to the result of a LINQ query. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default2.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/default2.aspx.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何設定網頁中定義的字串值陣列的屬性。The following example shows how to set the property to an array of string values is defined in the Web page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default3.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default3.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ SelectParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來建立 Select 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.

value.span: 物件，包含 Select 子句的參數。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the Select clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來存取參數，如 Select 子句中的處理常式事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Select clause in a handler for the event. 您可以修改 Select 子句，藉由新增或移除此集合中的參數。You can modify the Select clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 根據預設，的屬性物件包含您加入的任何參數的控制項。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將參數加入集合。The following example shows how to add a parameter to the collection. 加入的參數用來計算調整產品，根據是否產品都上有折扣價格。The added parameter is used to calculate an adjusted price for a product based on whether products are on discounted. 此範例的第一部分顯示的事件處理常式事件。The first part of the example shows the event handler for the event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default5.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default5.aspx#5)] 此範例的第二部分會顯示定義 Select 子句的標記。The second part of the example shows the markup that defines the Select clause. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default5.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default5.aspx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WhereParameters As IDictionary(Of String, Object)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ WhereParameters { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用於建立 Where 子句的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.

value.span: 物件，包含 Where 子句的參數。

span.span: An object that contains the parameters for the Where clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來存取參數的 Where 子句中的處理常式事件。You use the property to access parameters for the Where clause in a handler for the event. 您可以修改 Where 子句，藉由新增或移除此集合中的參數。You can modify the Where clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection. 根據預設，的屬性物件包含您加入的任何參數的控制項。By default, the property of the object contains any parameters that you added to the of the control. 當您將透過參數的集合物件，您必須包含在參數的預留位置屬性或 set屬性設`true`。When you add parameters through the collection of the object, you must either include a placeholder for the parameter in the property or set the property to `true`. 比方說，如果您加入名為`ProductName`中的事件處理常式事件，您就必須將屬性設`true`或設定屬性設`ProductName=@ProductName`。For example, if you add a parameter named `ProductName` in the event handler for the event, you must either set the property to `true` or set the property to `ProductName=@ProductName`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將參數加入集合。The following example shows how to add a parameter to the collection. 加入的參數會限制傳回的產品，其值為 「 Bike 」 這些產品在`Name`屬性。The added parameter will limit the returned products to only those products with a value of "Bike" in the `Name` property. 屬性設定為`true`以便參數會自動包含在 Where 子句。The property is set to `true` so that the parameter is automatically included in the Where clause. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/cs/Default4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs/vb/Default4.aspx#4)]
